# armis_lists (Data Source)

Retrieves Armis list information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "armis_lists" "all" {}

output "armis_lists_names" {
  description = "All Armis list names"
  value       = data.armis_lists.all.lists[*].name
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String) Optional filter by list name.
- `type` (String) Optional filter by list type.

### Read-Only

- `lists` (Attributes List) A computed list of lists. Each object in the list contains detailed information about a list. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--lists))

<a id="nestedatt--lists"></a>
### Nested Schema for `lists`

Read-Only:

- `created_by` (String) The user who created the list.
- `creation_time` (String) Creation time of the list.
- `description` (String) The description of the list.
- `id` (String) A unique identifier for the list.
- `last_update_time` (String) Last update time of the list.
- `last_updated_by` (String) The user who last updated the list.
- `list_type` (String) The type of the list.
- `name` (String) The name of the list.
